mapper.insert: insert into crew_comment (comment_num, crew_num, board_num, email, name, comment_content, comment_created, ref_no, ref_level) values (#{comment_num}, #{crew_num}, #{board_num}, #{email}, #{name}, #{comment_content}, sysdate, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from crew_comment where board_num = #{board_num}

SELECT comment_num, name, email, comment_content, TO_CHAR(comment_created,'YYYY.MM.DD. HH24:MI:ss') AS comment_created, CASE WHEN ref_no = 0 THEN '원댓글' ELSE '대댓글' END AS 댓글_유형, CASE WHEN ref_no = 0 THEN comment_num ELSE ref_no END AS ref_no, ref_level FROM crew_comment WHERE board_num = #{board_num} ORDER BY ref_no ASC, comment_created ASC
